verses.plain: Truly my soul waiteth upon God: from him cometh my salvation.

tokens.t: Truly my soul waiteth upon God: from him

verses.plain: He only is my rock and my salvation; he is my defence; I shall not be greatly moved.

tokens.t: my defence; I shall not be greatly moved.

verses.plain: How long will ye imagine mischief against a man? ye shall be slain all of you: as a bowing wall shall ye be, and as a tottering fence.

tokens.t: How long will ye imagine mischief against a man? ye shall be slain all of you: as a bowing wall

verses.plain: They only consult to cast him down from his excellency: they delight in lies: they bless with their mouth, but they curse inwardly. Selah.

tokens.t: down from his excellency: they delight in lies: they bless with their mouth, but they curse inwardly. Selah.

verses.plain: My soul, wait thou only upon God; for my expectation is from him.

tokens.t: My soul, wait thou only upon God; for my expectation

verses.plain: He only is my rock and my salvation: he is my defence; I shall not be moved.

tokens.t: my defence; I shall not be moved.

verses.plain: In God is my salvation and my glory: the rock of my strength, and my refuge, is in God.

tokens.t: my salvation and my glory: the rock of my strength,

verses.plain: Trust in him at all times; ye people, pour out your heart before him: God is a refuge for us. Selah.

tokens.t: Trust in him at all times;
people, pour out your heart before him: God

verses.plain: Surely men of low degree are vanity, and men of high degree are a lie: to be laid in the balance, they are altogether lighter than vanity.

tokens.t: a lie: to be laid in the balance, they

verses.plain: Trust not in oppression, and become not vain in robbery: if riches increase, set not your heart upon them.

tokens.t: Trust not in oppression, and become not vain in robbery: if riches increase, set not your heart

verses.plain: God hath spoken once; twice have I heard this; that power belongeth unto God.

tokens.t: God hath spoken once; twice have I heard this; that power

verses.plain: Also unto thee, O Lord, belongeth mercy: for thou renderest to every man according to his work.

tokens.t: mercy: for thou renderest to every man according to his work.

footnotes.text: inwardly: Heb. in their inward parts
